question: Hello, i am a 30 year old man  (sorry, i didn't know where else to put this question)  i hoped you could help me some.    I have never been diagnosed with diabetes and in fact i've been checked several months ago.  but lately my glucose has been staying somewhat high, it will be 130  six hours after i eat, and i get numbers slightly over 100 when i first wake up in the morning.   where as previously, my sugar is commonly in the 70's or 80's.   Anotehr phenominon is that i've had alot of acid reflux and constant atypical chest pain and bloating.   what does it sound like?  thank u
title: glucose problems
